channel.title: Need some help with spawning
channel.description: okay so i figured im starting my own rsps and i want it to be a spawn rsps but i wouldn't like players to spawn everything so can you tell me how can i stop them from spawning specific items ?

item.title: Need some help with spawning
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:


[code=java]public static boolean nonSpawnable(int item) {
	for (int i = 0; i < DONT_WANT_BITCHES_SPAWNING_THESE_ITEMS.length; i++) {
		if (item == DONT_WANT_BITCHES_SPAWNING_THESE_ITEMS[i]) {
			return true;
		}
	}
	return false;
}[/code]

[code=java]if(nonSpawnable(Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]))) {
	sendMessage("You can not Spawn that item!");
	return;
}[/code]



^ that looks unique :p?

public static boolean nonSpawnable(int item) { for (int i = 0; i < DONT_WANT_BITCHES_SPAWNING_THESE_ITEMS.length; i++) { if (item == DONT_WANT_BITCHES_SPAWNING_THESE_ITEMS[i]) { return true; } } return false; }

if(nonSpawnable(Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]))) { sendMessage("You can not Spawn that item!"); return; }

^ that looks unique :p?

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help with spawning
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Make an array of item IDs of all the items that you don’t want to be spawned.
From there, edit the item spawn command to check if the item being spawned is equal to the id in the array, if it is, then don’t allow the spawn

Read full topic
